item.title: #TIL : Shortcut keyboard improve productivity
item.description: Shortcut keyboard improve productivity Open the preference of any Application by Cmd + ,. Press Cmd + ~ to go previous App when switching App on Cmd + Tab Copy screenshot to clipboard by Cmd + Ctl + Shift + 3 Press Option when click to notification center is putting it on “Do no disturb” mode.
